name: Herdy Gerdy
description:
Herdy Gerdy is an arcade game developed by Core Design. It came out on 22-02-2002. It was published by Eidos Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Herdy Gerdy is available on PlayStation 2.
Clint Nembhard and Mike Schmitt produced the game. It was scored by Martin Iveson and Peter Connelly.
